text: is a Norwegian / English book that has in it a collection of stev and Norwegian folk songs. They were performed (or sung / recited) by Aslak Brekke, a master of the artists of "kveding" (the art of performing stev) ==Other information== *The book was published in 1983, as a part of a series called Norsk Folkeminnelags skrifter. *The author of the book is J.P. Ekgren, in collaboration with Dagne Groven Myhren (a professor in Norway). *The book was printed by Aschehoug ==Notes== Category:Norwegian literature Category:20th- century books Category:Folk songs
title: Aslak Brekke og visune hans
